thread.title: Setting up a mod in GTK 1.5

post.author: Ruckus
post.body:
Hey all,

I just got Gtk 1.5 and set it up for my Doom3 mod. Models and Entities load fine, but there are no textures. Is there anyway to manually specify where gtk should be looking for textures?

Note: When project is set to edit base Doom 3 I get all the base textures.

Thanks.

post.author: Ruckus
post.body:
